ContentTypes = { ".bmp" => "image/x-ms-bmp", ".doc" => "application/msword", ".odg" => "application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.graphics", ".odp" => "application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation", ".ods" => "application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet", ".odt" => "application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.text", ".ppt" => "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint", ".xls" => "application/vnd.ms-excel", }   HtmlUnit will recognize most common file types, but custom ones can be added here. Used for FileField uploads.
